title: Google, Microsoft, and more commit to AI safety at White House, Apple absent

title: OPPO Find N3 could come to America, sort of

title: The best Bose buds return to their Prime Day price

title: Google co-founder comes back to company to bolster its AI efforts
description: The co-founder is apparently helping with the hiring process.

title: Unbelievable price crash on the WD 500GB My Passport SSD
description: This highly rated portable SSD just plunged to an all-time low price of $36.99.

title: The Galaxy S24 series might not get a selfie camera upgrade
description: Samsung will need to lean on the processor and software for improvements, then.

title: Telegram now has Stories, but only Premium users can post one
description: The feature is a staple of all IM and social media apps, but Telegram has put its own spin to it.

title: We asked, you told us: You think Reddit’s contributor program is a bad idea
description: You really don't like the idea of Reddit launching a contributor program.

title: Motorola Razr Plus breaks in the strangest way during durability test
description: There's a void behind that beautiful external display.

title: This laser machine magically fixes green lines on OLED phone displays
description: No need to buy a whole new display or taking it apart!
